login.verificationTodo: If email not arrived, or expired, please send it again.

error.unknownError: Unknown Error, Please contact your administrator!

trainer.registrationInfo: If you want to be a trainer, please setup location, register and wait for approval.
trainer.title: Trainer
trainer.name: Name
trainer.waitingApprovalText: You are waiting for approval, to be a trainer.
trainer.approvedText: Congratulation, You are an approved trainer. Now you can use Training Groups menu on the top right menu bar.

trainingGroup.title: Training Group
trainingGroup.name: Name
trainingGroup.deleteConfirm: Are you sure, delete this group ?

setStateByTrainer.ACCEPTED: Are you sure you want to activate the user's memberships ?
setStateByTrainer.TRAINER_REQUEST: Are you sure you want to invite this user to the group?
setStateByTrainer.TRAINER_SUSPENDED: Are you sure you want to suspend the user's membership?
setStateByTrainer.null: Are you sure you want to delete this user's memberships?

setStateByUser.ACCEPTED: Are you sure you want to login to the group?
setStateByUser.USER_REQUEST: Are you sure you want to join to the group?
setStateByUser.USER_SUSPENDED: Are you sure you leave the trainer groups?
setStateByUser.null: Are you sure you want to delete this trainer contact?

confirm.noMoreTicket: You have run out of tickets. Are you sure to checkin?
confirm.buySeasonTicket: Are you sure, to add season ticket?
confirm.memberMissed: Returns the ticket of the missing member?
confirm.userRequest: Are you sure, to join the selected group?
confirm.removeFromGroup: Are you sure, to remove user from group?
confirm.leaveGroup: Are you sure, to leave group?
confirm.deleteEvent: Are you sure to delete selected event, and give tickets back to members?
confirm.activateEvent: Are you sure to activate event, and enable to join by members?
confirm.removeFromEvent: Are you sure to remove member from event?
confirm.addUserBonus: Are you sure to add bonus ticket to {{ name }}?

warning.consultTrainer: Please consult your trainer about tickets!
warning.deleteGroup: Please delete all members before delete group!
warning.selectionExistsNoTicket: You should buy season ticket, before you can select more than one event, in a group!
warning.maxMembershipError: Sorry, the training reached the maximum number of peoples, try to register for another time!
warning.membershipExists: You ara already has contact with the trainer, only the trainer can add more group memberships!
warning.trainerOwnGroup: You are the owner in this group!
warning.groupInviteOnly: You can join this group onyl, if trainer invites you!
warning.cancellationOutranged: Your time range to change join request is expired, please consult with your trainer!
warning.joinRequestOutranged: The training has started, join request expired!
warning.groupTypeChangeIfNotAttached: You can change group type only if there are no attached groups!
warning.trainerRequestExists: {{ trainer }} asked you to join the trainings. Please check the group and decide if you want to join.
warning.maxAvatarSize: The avatar size can not be bigger then 100 Kilobyte !
warning.ticketExpiredWarning: The {{ trainer }} - {{ group }} tickets will be expired in {{ date }} !

trainerRequest.subject: Training Join Request
trainerRequest.html:
{{ trainer }} asked you to join the trainings.

Log in at the link below and accept the invitation!

{{ link }}

Best regards,
The Trainer Sheet team.
